column5: I saw the Dave Mercer OFC profile, is it actually him?, He's like a fishing ICON so I find it slightly peculiar he'd be hanging around a forum?  P.S If it is you, and your reading this, Love yur show!!!

Well young fellow why dont you go to his website and be a part of his fan club !!!  www.factsoffishing.com im sure he would like that ....and yes dave is a member here and he does post.... too go get em tiger!!!
yeah it's Dave.....  and this is the best forum on the web where else would he be....LOL
Now only if we can get Howie Longshot to register on here we'd be set!

Hi All, I hope everyone had a great Christmas and I wish you all a Happy New Year! Yes Marcus it is me and thanks for being such a great fan. As far as OFC goes this is a great forum and I don't know of too many pros who don't come here. OFC'ers are some of the best anglers around. Take care everyone and Happy New Year!
Ya see,you ask and he responsed. Thats the kinda guy he is. Dave, you and yours, have a great happy new year aswell.
You need to get out more! LOL  G.
Your developing quite a cult following there Dave, better watch out for the groupies and stalkers! LOL

Yeah no kidding, that'd be creepy.  On an unrelated note, Dave, your shower this morning was a little long. Next time please don't hang the towel over the door, it was hard to see properly through cameras 5 and 7.
GO DAVE GO  lolz .. Facts Of Fishing... best fishing show on TV

In my time I have met and sung with many famous artists, had one or two over for dinner, and the biggest lesson I have learned is that they are people just like you or I. They just happen to be better at a certain thing than most other people. Don't be too wowed by celebrity, it is no big deal.
LOL.. hes real... any one that big.. like me is very real...
Love the avatar.... I saw Lajoie live in TO earlier this month.  What an awesome guy.
Dave is way smaller in person as well...
yeah I hear that tv puts on 60 lbs       LOL  sorry, but it seemed like the funny thing to say
